data.text: Mkibuli chake munhu yehile komsaka munhu yonyolila,
Munhu yehile koigodela kusulukila mmoyo wake,
Munhu yehile, koitapa na hamzahila Imulungu,
Nzila za munhu yehile zogendelela goya,
Kogelegeza mmoyo wake, “Haduhu kinhu chonda kingaze,
Mulomo wake umema kuduwila na uvizi na kunanga,
Habali imunhu yehile yambezeli Imulungu na kulonga mmoyo wake,
Lakini gweye kowalola iwanhu ogaya na kudununzwa,
Uzibene zinguvu za munhu yehile na imunhu yotenda ganyolodoke,
Mndewa Imulungu ayo Mndewa siku zose na milele!
Gweye Mndewa Imulungu, kuhulika viyopula imunhu mkiwa,
Kowatendela ganogile iwana wakiwa na iwanhu odununzwa,
